talk.abstract: In January 2012, Amazon introduced DynamoDB, a NoSQL database service with seamless, linear scalability. How can we neatly integrate it in Python applications and address its shortcomings?
talk.description: In January 2012, Amazon introduced DynamoDB, a NoSQL database service with seamless, linear scalability. How can we neatly integrate it in Python applications and address its shortcomings?
talk.name: DynamoDB and DynamoDB-Mapper -- Building scalable Python applications with Amazon's NoSQL database
talk.title: DynamoDB and DynamoDB-Mapper -- Building scalable Python applications with Amazon's NoSQL database
